definitions.text: the state of being certain that adverse effects will not be caused by some agent under defined conditions
examples: insure the safety of the children
the reciprocal of safety is risk

definitions.text: a device designed to prevent injury or accidents
(baseball) the successful act of striking a baseball in such a way that the batter reaches base safely
contraceptive device consisting of a sheath of thin rubber or latex that is worn over the penis during intercourse
a score in American football; a player is tackled behind his own goal line
